definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: It has been used to treat symptoms of Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 该技术已被用来治疗帕金森症。

sentences.english: In one case, RBD preceded Parkinson's disease by 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 有一例是，RBD先于帕金森综合症50年存在。

sentences.english: The role of autophagy-lysosome pathway in neurodegeneration associated with Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森病相关神经变性中自噬溶酶体途径的作用。

sentences.english: In the past, treatment of Parkinson s disease (PD) aimed at the liver - wind.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森病以往多从肝风论治。

sentences.english: The most common speech disorder of parkinson's disease is hypokinetic dysarthria .
sentences.chinese: 运动减少性构音障碍是帕金森病的主要言语障碍。

sentences.english: Parkinsons disease occurs with increasing frequency in older people.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森氏病在老人身上更为频发。

sentences.english: Currently there is no treatment that has been shown to slow the progression of PD .
sentences.chinese: 目前还没有一种有效的治疗可以延缓帕金森病的进程。

sentences.english: After searching for answers, she was finally diagnosed with Parkinson's.
sentences.chinese: 多方寻求答案后，她最终被确诊为患有帕金森症。

sentences.english: To study effective method for disordered sports of parkinsonism.
sentences.chinese: 探讨提高帕金森病运动障碍的有效办法。

sentences.english: A total of 556 participants reported having Parkinson's disease during follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 共有556参与者报告了帕金森氏症患者的随访活动。

sentences.english: Forthermore, exercise could enhance behavioral resume of parkinsonism .
sentences.chinese: 此外，运动还可促进帕金森病的行为恢复。

sentences.english: In one case, RBD preceded Parkinson’s disease by 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 有一例是，RBD先于帕金森综合症50年存在。

sentences.english: An electronic skin patch can detect Parkinson's-like tremors and automatically deliver medicine.
sentences.chinese: 电子皮肤贴片可以检测帕金森震颤，并自动提供药品。

sentences.english: Parkinson had a sharp eye for the absurd.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森对于荒诞不经的事一眼即明。

sentences.english: Parkinsonism is the general term that describes a number of movement disorders.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森综合症是多种运动障碍的总称。

sentences.english: Dr. Bloem and other Parkinson’s specialists were amazed.
sentences.chinese: 这样的结果令布隆医生和其他帕金森病专家颇感惊奇。

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4
A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 zheng4

definition: Alois Alzheimer (1864-1915), German psychiatrist and neuropathologist

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 ying4 hua4 zheng4
